ygData.subject: RE: Wizard talk
ygData.msgSnippet: Funny, I tried hunting treant and after getting 7-8 faction msg, I quit doing that liao.  As for HH keep solo pickclaw, it s ok but sometime pickclaw resis my
ygData.messageBody:
Funny, I tried hunting treant and after getting 7-8 faction msg, I quit
doing that liao. As for HH keep solo pickclaw, it's ok but sometime
pickclaw resis my root or enstil 3 times on a row, very dangerous ;(

I rather hunt with FF and get less xp and take longer time, coz at least
the pet can help to tank abit 1st and allow me to cast root over and over
again until I managed to root it. For him, his downtime is slower coz of
my nuking, and much safer when I root the mob b4 he nuke. The earth pet
rooting suc big time, one nuke from me the clawpick sure come to me.

Ziltus

On Thursday, 12 August, 1999 10:18 PM, Cogar [SMTP:cogar@...]
wrote:
> From: Cogar <cogar@...>
>
> Yes, i went to qeynos and the guards judges me amiably. At lvl 29 get
a partner to kill treant or go to highkeep and solo pickclaw lookout,
> very good exp and theres a safe spot there for you to run to when you get
in trouble, No death.
>
> LKW wrote:
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > Doh, u sure no faction hit? I got the faction msg on the 3rd treant I
killed. Now I need a good place for solo wiz at lvl 29, any tips? ;)
> >
> > On Thursday, 12 August, 1999 7:07 PM, Cogar [SMTP:cogar@...]
wrote:
> > > From: Cogar <cogar@...>
> > >
> > > Hiya all, will like to know if anyone has an intelligent
> > > more than 186? If you do can u share with us the items you have?
Thanks
> > > BTW, the treant tip given by diablo is real nice, great
exp,
> > > great loot and no faction loss( may be a bug). Diablo, so have u
> > > discovered anymore such cool places for lvl 35 and up?
